backend/main.mo: Implements cart and order management with Map storage and supports AliExpress product HTML fetching via HTTP outcalls.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking features to files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing the purpose and recent updates of various frontend files.
frontend/EMBEDDING_SHOPIFY.md: Documentation explaining how to embed the storefront inside Shopify using an iframe.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based theme variables and styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, theming, query client, and cart context for the main React application.
frontend/src/cart/cartStorage.ts: Handles loading, saving, and clearing versioned cart data in localStorage.
frontend/src/cart/cartTypes.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for cart items and overall cart state.
frontend/src/cart/useCart.tsx: Provides React context and hooks for cart operations including add, remove, update, clear, and subtotal calculations.
frontend/src/checkout/validation.ts: Contains form validation logic for checkout fields with simple error messages.
frontend/src/components/product/ImageGal: Displays product images with a main viewer, navigation controls, and selectable thumbnails.
frontend/src/components/product/ProductD: Shows product description and specifications inside an accordion-based card.
Fetches and displays detailed product info including images, pricing, quantity selection, and add‑to‑cart logic.
frontend/src/components/product/ReviewsS: Renders product review summary with star ratings and review count.
frontend/src/components/product/Shipping: Shows shipping details and return policy in a styled card if available.
frontend/src/components/StorefrontLayout: Provides main storefront layout with separate embedded and full modes, rendering header, navigation, cart badge, and page content.
frontend/src/config/storefrontProducts.t: Defines configuration for curated storefront products with optional display names and price overrides.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useEmbedMode.ts: Determines whether the app is running in embed mode based on URL parameters.
frontend/src/hooks/useEmbedNavigation.ts: Provides navigation that preserves embed mode by appending the embed parameter to routes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, identity loading, login, logout, and related context exposure.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks to fetch normalized AliExpress product data and place orders via the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes with utility tweaks.
frontend/src/lib/aliExpress/normalizePro: Parses AliExpress HTML to extract product fields with fallback logic and helper extractors.
frontend/src/lib/aliExpress/productIdent: Generates stable product IDs from AliExpress URLs and provides URL normalization.
frontend/src/lib/aliExpress/productSourc: Defines default AliExpress product URL and fetches product HTML through the backend actor.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/models/product.ts: TypeScript interfaces defining product, images, variants, reviews, shipping, and metadata models.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays cart items with quantity controls, totals, and navigation for empty or filled carts.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Renders checkout form, validates input, submits orders, and clears cart on success.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Shows order confirmation details and navigation after a successful purchase.
frontend/src/pages/ProductPage.tsx: Page that fetches a single AliExpress product, displays its details, and supports adding it to the cart with quantity controls and loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/StorefrontPage.tsx: Renders a list of predefined products using ProductDetailSection components separated by dividers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the project's design system.
project_state.json: Tracks project requirements, existing features, and architectural notes for a multi-product dropshipping storefront with shared cart and checkout.
